<a id="InputMap"></a>

# InputMap

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

A singleton that manages all [InputEventAction](InputEventAction.md)\\ s.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Manages all [InputEventAction](InputEventAction.md) which can be created/modified from the project settings menu **Project &gt; Project Settings &gt; Input Map** or in code with [add_action()](InputMap.md#InputMap_method_add_action) and [action_add_event()](InputMap.md#InputMap_method_action_add_event). See [Node._input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__input).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent: InputMap](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md#inputmap)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="InputMap_method_action_add_event"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **action_add_event**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md), event\: [InputEvent](InputEvent.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_add_event)

Adds an [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) to an action. This [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) will trigger the action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_erase_event"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **action_erase_event**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md), event\: [InputEvent](InputEvent.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_erase_event)

Removes an [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) from an action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_erase_events"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **action_erase_events**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_erase_events)

Removes all events from an action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_get_deadzone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **action_get_deadzone**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_get_deadzone)

Returns a deadzone value for the action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_get_events"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[InputEvent](InputEvent.md)\] **action_get_events**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_get_events)

Returns an array of [InputEvent](InputEvent.md)\\ s associated with a given action.

\ **Note:** When used in the editor (e.g. a tool script or [EditorPlugin](EditorPlugin.md)), this method will return events for the editor action. If you want to access your project's input binds from the editor, read the ``input/*`` settings from [ProjectSettings](ProjectSettings.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_has_event"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **action_has_event**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md), event\: [InputEvent](InputEvent.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_has_event)

Returns ``true`` if the action has the given [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) associated with it.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_action_set_deadzone"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **action_set_deadzone**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md), deadzone\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_action_set_deadzone)

Sets a deadzone value for the action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_add_action"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_action**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md), deadzone\: [float](float.md) = 0.2\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_add_action)

Adds an empty action to the **InputMap** with a configurable `deadzone`.

An [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) can then be added to this action with [action_add_event()](InputMap.md#InputMap_method_action_add_event).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_erase_action"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **erase_action**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_erase_action)

Removes an action from the **InputMap**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_event_is_action"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **event_is_action**\ (\ event\: [InputEvent](InputEvent.md), action\: [StringName](StringName.md), exact_match\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_event_is_action)

Returns ``true`` if the given event is part of an existing action. This method ignores keyboard modifiers if the given [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) is not pressed (for proper release detection). See [action_has_event()](InputMap.md#InputMap_method_action_has_event) if you don't want this behavior.

If `exact_match` is ``false``, it ignores additional input modifiers for [InputEventKey](InputEventKey.md) and [InputEventMouseButton](InputEventMouseButton.md) events, and the direction for [InputEventJoypadMotion](InputEventJoypadMotion.md) events.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_get_action_description"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_action_description**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_get_action_description)

Returns the human-readable description of the given action.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_get_actions"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[StringName](StringName.md)\] **get_actions**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_get_actions)

Returns an array of all actions in the **InputMap**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_has_action"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_action**\ (\ action\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_has_action)

Returns ``true`` if the **InputMap** has a registered action with the given name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputMap_method_load_from_project_settings"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **load_from_project_settings**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#InputMap_method_load_from_project_settings)

Clears all [InputEventAction](InputEventAction.md) in the **InputMap** and load it anew from [ProjectSettings](ProjectSettings.md).
